    Blacklist

    The extension will not load on the domains listed below. Insert each domain in a new line.

    Each line is compared to the end of the domain, meaning "gle.com" will also match "google.com" and "mail.google.com". You can use Regular-Expressions, but notice that dots ('.') will be escaped automatically.

    Whitelist

    If not left empty, the extension will load only on the domains listed below. Insert each domain in a new line, like the blacklist.

    Usage Statistics

    Knowing how people use this extension helps ensuring that everything works as it supposed to. If opted-in, the extension will not send any personal data (including settings data). Your browser details and your usage of TimePrices will be sent using Google Analytics.

    ✔ Saved

    How To Use

    Insert your income in the settings, then browse to any site and hover with your cursor over a price. A small tooltip will show the time it will take you to earn that amount of money. Try these:

    $0.10

    $12

    £12

    $1.5K

    $20M
